channel.title: The piano sonatas of Haydn
channel.description:
Illustrated lecture series featuring 34 piano sonatas of Haydn as demonstrated by Canadian pianist Raymond Dudley, Concert Artist in Residence at the University of Cincinnati College-Conservatory.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Fourth program, part one
item.description: This program, the first of two parts, presents pianist Raymond Dudley performing sonatas composed by Joseph Haydn.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Third program, part two
item.description: This program, the second of two parts, presents pianist Raymond Dudley performing sonatas composed by Joseph Haydn.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts
